name: SecKeychainEvent
desc: The list of keychain events that can trigger a callback.

items.name: case unlockEvent
items.desc: Indicates a keychain was successfully unlocked.

items.name: case addEvent
items.desc: Indicates an item was added to a keychain.

items.name: case deleteEvent
items.desc: Indicates an item was deleted from a keychain.

items.name: case updateEvent
items.desc: Indicates a keychain item was updated.

items.name: case passwordChangedEvent
items.desc: Indicates the keychain password was changed.

items.name: case defaultChangedEvent
items.desc: Indicates that a different keychain was specified as the default.

items.name: case keychainListChangedEvent
items.desc: Indicates the list of keychains has changed.
